name: Soft-body Tetris
description:
Have you ever seen those animations of a soft-body Tetris game? There’s this channel C4D4U that has been uploading different versions of the same concept for several years. But apparently that’s not an actual game, so I always wondered: would that be fun to play? This prototype is an attempt to answer that question.

Controls

  • Move: LEFT and RIGHT arrows.
  • Rotate: Z and X; or UP arrow and CTRL.
  • Speed-up: DOWN arrow or SPACE.
